Method Detail

act

public void act()
yes, a world can act in the same way as an Actor. In this case, the code just looks for mouse clicks and ... well, you have to figure out what else to do ... ... you may add code anywhere you want to in this method.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.World

columnFull

public boolean columnFull(int col)
YOU WILL NEED TO CODE THIS, OR BALLS WILL "OVERFLOW" THE COLUMNS!!! This function should return true if the column already has 8 balls in it; otherwise it should return false.

Parameters:
col - - the column number to check

winnerName - - the name of the player taht won the game

getX

public int getX(int col)
given a specific column number in the game, returns the middle of the column's x-value in the world

Parameters:
col - - The column number (0..7) of the column in question

getY

public int getY(int row)
given a specific row number in the game, returns the middle of the row's world y-value

Parameters:
row - - The row number (0..7) of the row in question
